root.name: Shivers
root.description: OverviewShivers takes place in and around Professor Windlenot's Museum of the Strange and Unusual. The player character, the professor's nephew, is investigating his uncle's disappearance. Traversing the museum presents the player with a variety of self-contained puzzles, many of which can be attempted in a non-linear fashion.
